What it is: Catalogs the symbolic defenses you wear to protect against emotional pain.
How to use it: Describe how you react when vulnerable. Ask AI to list the symbolic armors and their side effects.
What it changes: Replaces rigid defenses with conscious protection strategies.

What it is: Symbolically reclaims suppressed power by mapping divine traits onto the self.
How to use it: Ask AI: ‘If I were a deity, what would my dominion, rituals, and mythos be?’
What it changes: Restores access to repressed personal sovereignty.

What it is: Analyzes the symbolic values passed down from ancestors and their emotional economy.
How to use it: List values or behaviors from family. Ask AI to trace the symbolic economy of those inherited currencies.

What it is: Finds symbolic meaning in your repeated physical spaces and environmental setups.
How to use it: Describe your rooms or locations you frequent. Ask AI what symbolic messages your space encodes.
What it changes: Turns passive context into meaningful influence.

What it is: Reframes each failure as a symbolic rite, lesson, or metamorphosis phase.
How to use it: List your biggest failures. Ask AI how each one symbolically advances your transformation.
What it changes: Rewrites the emotional gravity of failure into momentum.

What it is: Visualizes the structure of your unconscious as symbolic rooms, doors, or layouts.
How to use it: Ask AI to describe the symbolic floor plan of your psyche and what each room holds.
What it changes: Creates a mental map for navigating inner complexity.

What it is: Unearths ancient, outdated beliefs buried in your emotional strata.
How to use it: Describe your oldest assumptions. Ask AI to simulate an excavation and label each symbolic fossil.
What it changes: Makes outdated beliefs visible for intentional replacement.

What it is: Traces how you buffer against sudden emotional impact.
How to use it: Describe a recent jolt. Ask AI how your psyche cushioned it and what symbolic mechanism took the hit.
What it changes: Enhances self-awareness of emotional resilience systems.

What it is: Designs rituals to symbolically parent the part of you that never received what it needed.
How to use it: Describe unmet childhood needs. Ask AI to design symbolic caretaking rituals.
What it changes: Fills emotional gaps through structured symbolic nurture.

What it is: Locates talents or instincts that were shamed, ignored, or punished into hiding.
How to use it: Describe moments of suppression. Ask AI what latent gift was being blocked.
